title: Bitcoin Approaches $110,000 As Stronger Sentiment Fuels Risk-Off Bets
description: Bitcoin prices climbed on July 2, reaching their highest in roughly three weeks amid varying bullish developments and their corresponding impact on market sentiment.
content:
Bitcoin prices rallied on July 2.
